mapper.select: SELECT U.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, U.REVEAL_ITEM as item, U.AMOUNT_CURRENT as amountCurrent, U.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR as crAmountAdj, U.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR as drAmountAdj, U.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST as amountAuditLast FROM wp_u U where 1 = 1 and U.STATUS = 'Y' and U.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U.PERIOD = #{period}
